title: Cottage pie with garlic mash
ingredients: ['4 large potatoes, quartered', '6 tablespoons butter, divided', '1 clove garlic, minced', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '450g lean beef mince', '1 tablespoon herbes de Provence', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '225g frozen garden peas']
